title: "Artificial Intelligence: how are architects using AI right now and what are they using it for?"
excerpt: "This week, RIBA has published the findings from the first ever industry-wide survey of how architects are responding to Artificial Intelligence (AI) in the architectural profession. The results suggest that AI will be widely adopted and integrated into practice and is expected to deliver tangible benefits for the profession in the near term."
